register.name: RMR_EL1
register.description: If EL1 is the highest implemented Exception level and this register is implemented...

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Reset Request. Setting this bit to 1 requests a Warm reset.

bitField.name: AA64
bitField.description: When EL1 can use AArch32, determines which Execution state the PE boots into after a Warm reset:

register.name: RMR_EL2
register.description: If EL2 is the highest implemented Exception level and this register is implemented...

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Reset Request. Setting this bit to 1 requests a Warm reset.

bitField.name: AA64
bitField.description: When EL2 can use AArch32, determines which Execution state the PE boots into after a Warm reset:

register.name: RMR_EL3
register.description: If EL3 is the implemented and this register is implemented...

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Reset Request. Setting this bit to 1 requests a Warm reset.

bitField.name: AA64
bitField.description: When EL3 can use AArch32, determines which Execution state the PE boots into after a Warm reset:

register.name: RVBAR_EL1
register.gui_name: Reset Vector Base Address Register (if EL2 and EL3 not implemented)
register.description: If EL1 is the highest Exception level implemented, contains the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED address that execution starts from after reset when executing in AArch64 state.

register.name: RVBAR_EL2
register.gui_name: Reset Vector Base Address Register (if EL3 not implemented)
register.description: If EL2 is the highest Exception level implemented, contains the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED address that execution starts from after reset when executing in AArch64 state.

register.name: RVBAR_EL3
register.gui_name: Reset Vector Base Address Register (if EL3 implemented)
register.description: If EL3 is the highest Exception level implemented, contains the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED address that execution starts from after reset when executing in AArch64 state.
